title: John Bourgeois - The Dreamcatchers Show
itunes:title: John Bourgeois - The Dreamcatchers Show
description:
Goals are great - until they’re not. Fact is, if you’re spending more time dreaming than you are doing, it’s time to switch up your approach and start making some progress.
 
John Bourgeois founded the Dreamcatcher Show to connect with people who are, simply, crushing it in their own personal arenas. The point is to dissect real, no-BS success so listeners can stop reaching for what they want and just go get it.
 
On this episode of the Underdog Empowerment podcast, Zach and John jam on learning from mistakes and constructive criticism, why confidence is essential to succeeding at literally anything (and why humility is overrated), and the actual definition of what we call “selflessness.” Join in to bypass the information overload on the Internet and figure out how to get where you want to go.

Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/john-bourgeois/

Get More Involved:

1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://underdogempowerment.com/roadmap
3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
